content:
I'm getting an error with this fsh when trying to constrain an external extension:

Alias: PatientBirthPlaceExtension = http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/patient-birthPlace

Profile:        Mypatient
Parent:         us-core-patient
Id:             mypatient
Title:          "My Patient"
Description:    "My patient"

* extension contains PatientBirthPlaceExtension named PatBirthPlaceExt MS
* extension[PatBirthPlaceExt].city 1..1 MS

the error is

No element found at path extension[PatBirthPlaceExt].city for Mypatient, skipping rule

I must be missing something obvious, but what is it?

sushi v0.11.1
I do that kinda stuff all the time :)
Nice that sushi picks it up for me!
